bug_description: When the same video is liked from different tabs, unliking it in the Favourite tab only updates one instance; the duplicate entry remains liked/visible, causing an inconsistent favourite state across duplicates.
action: Like the same video in two different tabs (e.g., Trending and Touch). Go to Favourite tab, then tap the heart icon to unlike the video.
expected_state: Unliking a video should apply globally to that video ID: all duplicate entries across tabs (and in Favourite) should be removed/updated together so the video is no longer marked as liked anywhere.
